ygData.subject: Re: Languages (was: Spare Skill points)
ygData.msgSnippet: If you know gnoll then chances are some other player (like me!) knows it too. Just sit down and listen to them spout at the mouth for a good hour. Good
ygData.messageBody:
If you know gnoll then chances are some other player (like me!) knows it
too. Just sit down and listen to them spout at the mouth for a good hour.

Good Journey,

Sineras (Cazic-Thule)


-----Original Message-----
From: Fun Bob [mailto:fun-bob@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 09, 1999 11:19 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Languages (was: Spare Skill points)


From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>

As to languages. Other than the obvious of spending those much cherished
skill points when you gain a level, is there any other way to raise
something? I have Gnoll right now, and its at a pretty low level, like 12 I
think, and since I dont see myself having any sort of conversations with
Fippy Darkpaw, or any others of his kind, how would this be raised?
